website_summaries.verdict: Danner reintroduces the Jag on the market and it eventually gains positive remarks. The brand is successful in redesigning it as a lightweight yet durable hiking boot. It reaches out to experts, newbies and casual walkers, and obtains their approval.However, a notable rating does not equate to perfection. It seems that Danner misses a few points in addressing comfort. Overall, the Danner Jag is a worthy pair of hiking boots, on and off the trail. So maybe with a little intervention, comfort is within one’s grasp.
pros: Several hiking enthusiasts, as well as urban casual walkers, highly recommend the Danner Jag for its versatility
The roomy forefoot area of the boot receives a high rating from a couple of users
A handful of hikers testifies to its durability
Plenty of those who bought the Danner Jag appreciate its lightness
It is able to protect the feet from getting wet, based on numerous user reviews
Some wearers declare that this day hiking boot requires little-to-no breaking in
Loads of owners and a few experts are dumbfounded by the retro style of the Jag from Danner
A significant number of wearers state that it was a great crossover between a sneaker and a hiking boot
cons: A small percentage of Danner Jag owners feel let down because they experienced pain at the toes
Some hikers are crestfallen when they feel discomfort in the ankle area
According to the minority, the Danner Jag disallows their foot to breathe, making it uncomfortable to wear in warm weather hikes

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: My feet are narrow, so these did not fit me well. Normally, I buy the danner leather boots because they run narrow. But not these. The quality was good, but just didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: corliss

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoe. Can wear them hiking or outdoors but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoe. Can wear them hiking or outdoors but also great for city and every day use boot.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, stiff shank with a nice balance between ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, stiff shank with a nice balance between support and comfort. Looks like it'll last awhile, too. The only issue is sizing. I usually wear a 9.5-10, but was swimming in the 9.5s. I think I will need an 8.5 in this shoe. I guess that's pretty standard with Danner; wish they'd adjust their sizing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tyler Prince

customer_reviews.title: nice comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: nice comfortable boot, but not recommended for everyday construction.the outside of my right boot just before the rubber toe guard tor open after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine S

customer_reviews.title: ... how well they'll serve as hiking boots but they're super comfortable. Feels more like a sneaker than a ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well they'll serve as hiking boots but they're super comfortable. Feels more like a sneaker than a boot. I don't think I could use these for backpacking but for dayhikes they seem perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo A. Silvestre

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I wear a US men's size 11 and these fit great. Quick break-in time and very strong materials. Would recommend for casual wear or light hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Rational Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe.I find the sole to be to thin,meaning i can feel every rock or pebbel i step on.
customer_reviews.author: fonza

customer_reviews.title: Couple weeks of wear and they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Couple weeks of wear and they fit like a glove
customer_reviews.author: robert driskel

customer_reviews.title: Solid and durable boot for general wear (work) during the winter months.  Stylish too...
customer_reviews.text: such a comfortable and strong boot, not too heavy not too light, perfect for indoor or outdoor work and general getting around town in the winter months. easy to slip on and lace up, pleanty of arch support so no problem if you're on your feet all day. Comes pre-coated with some sort of water-proofing/stain repelent, which is very nice, as I had worried the boot might show dirt and salt stains too easily, but it is actually quite resistant to these elements. Danner makes a lot of military boots, so you know what you are getting is a quality product, made by people who care.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hoevel

customer_reviews.title: Classic hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, a little stiff at first so I would recommend wearing them in a bit before you take them on any long excursions. Danner doesn't have many options for women in the Jag boot (only 1 color) so I ordered the men's version. I wear a size 9 women's and the 7 men's fit perfectly. The colors are pretty neutral, light grey with green canvas and they seem like they'll wear nicely over the years. These are a great option if you don't want anything bright or with a bunch of addornments like a lot of hiking boots seem to have.
customer_reviews.author: erine

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box comfort
customer_reviews.text: Even though I haven't had a chance yet to break these in on the trail, and the boot is slightly larger than expected, the jag is probably the most comfortable boot, out of the box, that I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Volkens

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe but did not fit me correctly are not the style I was loking to get
customer_reviews.text: they did not feel good on my feet wore around the house but just never got to like returned and will look at another style later, they looked to be a quality shoe but just didn't fit me correctly
customer_reviews.author: oc

product_meta.title: Danner Mens Jag-M Jag-m
product_meta.description: Inspired by the 1980s danner free spirit hiking boot, the jag is a contemporary take on the retro hiker. The jag offers a versatile, dynamic look ideal for urban exploring.
feature_bullets: Cement construction with external molded heel cup for support
Cushioning three-density open-cell polyurethane ortholite footbed
